title: ‘We Have to Rethink the Way We Race’: Vingegaard, Evenepoel’s Tour de France Plans in Balance after Brutal Itzulia Basque Crash
content:
Vingegaard suffers collapsed lung, broken ribs; Evenepoel's 'long-term plans not in danger'; peloton points to bumpy corner as crux of horrific accident.

Read the full article at ‘We Have to Rethink the Way We Race’: Vingegaard, Evenepoel’s Tour de France Plans in Balance after Brutal Itzulia Basque Crash on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
